caption: This photograph captures a group of six pelicans in flight against a clear sky. The pelicans are spread across the image, soaring at different heights and angles which adds a dynamic sense to the composition. The sky serves as a minimal, unobtrusive background, featuring a subtle gradient of blue tones which suggest it could be either early morning or late evening. The lighting appears soft and diffused, highlighting the pelicansâ€™ large, impressive wingspans and their distinctive body shapes. The birds' positions and spread wings emphasize a sense of freedom and movement. Overall, the photograph depicts a tranquil scene of natural avian grace and synchronization.
title: Pelicans fly in formation above the Houston ship channel
